You can't compute derivatives over integers

With all due respect that doesn't sound quite right. Heck, in BNNs even bitwise operations have defined derivatives.

And do you mean to say that autograd doesn't fully support them or at all? because it looks like at least for some basic cases I've tried gradients seem to be fine.
